text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

How do people develop a
passion for their work?

What are the processes
and the strategies

that people can use to
identify new things they're
passionate about?

And the other thing,
which I've mostly

focused on over the
last couple of years,

is how do people maintain
a passion over time
without burning out?

Having this great
community of PhD students

is something that
I hadn't expected.

When I applied to
PhD programs, I

was thinking about
my relationships

with my potential advisors,
but not about all the people

that would be sitting
in the same office as me
every single day.

And I feel so supported
because we struggle together,
we have successes together.

We have fun outside
of work, at work.

It's, I think, one of
the most meaningful
experiences I've ever had.
